property.name: BEFORE_PLACE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a ComboBox is placed. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_PLACE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a ComboBox is placed. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: anchoredObjectSettings
property.shortdesc: Anchored object settings.

property.name: textWrapPreferences
property.shortdesc: The text wrap preference properties that define the default formatting for wrapping text around objects.

property.name: associatedXMLElement
property.shortdesc: The XML element associated with the ComboBox.

property.name: transparencySettings
property.shortdesc: Transparency settings.

property.name: strokeTransparencySettings
property.shortdesc: Transparency settings for the stroke.

property.name: fillTransparencySettings
property.shortdesc: Transparency settings for the fill applied to the ComboBox.

property.name: contentTransparencySettings
property.shortdesc: Transparency settings for the content of the ComboBox.

property.name: linkedPageItemOptions
property.shortdesc: Linked Page Item options

property.name: overridden
property.shortdesc: If true, the object originated on a master spread and was overridden. If false, the object either originated on a master spread and was not overridden, or the object did not originate on a master page.

property.name: overriddenMasterPageItem
property.shortdesc: An object that originated on a master page and has been overridden. Can return: PageItem, Guide, Graphic, Movie or Sound.

property.name: allPageItems
property.shortdesc: Lists all page items contained by the ComboBox.

property.name: allGraphics
property.shortdesc: Lists all graphics contained by the ComboBox.

property.name: parentPage
property.shortdesc: The page on which this page item appears.

property.name: animationSettings
property.shortdesc: The page item animation settings.

property.name: timingSettings
property.shortdesc: The object timing settings.

property.name: allArticles
property.shortdesc: The list of all articles this page item is part of

property.name: id
property.shortdesc: The unique ID of the ComboBox.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the ComboBox &#40;a PlaceGun, Character, Spread, MasterSpread, SplineItem, Polygon, GraphicLine, Rectangle, Oval, Group or Snippet).

property.name: index
property.shortdesc: The index of the ComboBox within its containing object.

property.name: preferences
property.shortdesc: A collection of preferences objects.

property.name: ovals
property.shortdesc: A collection of ellipses.

property.name: splineItems
property.shortdesc: The spline items collection.

property.name: pageItems
property.shortdesc: The page items collection, which can be used to process all page items in a container &#40;such as a document, page, or group), regardless of type.

property.name: rectangles
property.shortdesc: A collection of rectangles.

property.name: graphicLines
property.shortdesc: A collection of graphic lines.

property.name: textFrames
property.shortdesc: A collection of text frames.

property.name: polygons
property.shortdesc: A collection of polygons.

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: images
property.shortdesc: A collection of bitmap images in any bitmap file format &#40;including TIFF, JPEG, or GIF).

property.name: graphics
property.shortdesc: A collection of imported graphics in any graphic file format &#40;vector, metafile, or bitmap).

property.name: epss
property.shortdesc: A collection of EPS files.

property.name: wmfs
property.shortdesc: A collection of WMF graphics.

property.name: picts
property.shortdesc: A collection of PICT graphics.

property.name: pdfs
property.shortdesc: A collection of PDF files.

property.name: groups
property.shortdesc: A collection of groups.

property.name: epstexts
property.shortdesc: EPSTexts

property.name: submitFormBehaviors
property.shortdesc: A collection of submit form behavior objects.

property.name: behaviors
property.shortdesc: A collection of behavior objects.

property.name: clearFormBehaviors
property.shortdesc: A collection of clear form behavior objects.

property.name: printFormBehaviors
property.shortdesc: A collection of print form behavior objects.

property.name: viewZoomBehaviors
property.shortdesc: A collection of view zoom behavior objects.

property.name: soundBehaviors
property.shortdesc: A collection of sound behavior objects.

property.name: showHideFieldsBehaviors
property.shortdesc: A collection of show/hide fields behavior objects.

property.name: movieBehaviors
property.shortdesc: A collection of movie behavior objects.

property.name: gotoAnchorBehaviors
property.shortdesc: A collection of goto anchor behavior objects.

property.name: gotoFirstPageBehaviors
property.shortdesc: A collection of goto first page behavior objects.

property.name: gotoLastPageBehaviors
property.shortdesc: A collection of goto last page behavior objects.

property.name: gotoNextPageBehaviors
property.shortdesc: A collection of goto next page behavior objects.

property.name: gotoPreviousPageBehaviors
property.shortdesc: A collection of goto previous page behavior objects.

property.name: gotoNextViewBehaviors
property.shortdesc: A collection of goto next view behavior objects.

property.name: gotoPreviousViewBehaviors
property.shortdesc: A collection of goto previous view behavior objects.

property.name: gotoURLBehaviors
property.shortdesc: A collection of goto URL behavior objects.

property.name: openFileBehaviors
property.shortdesc: A collection of open file behavior objects.

property.name: readOnly
property.shortdesc: If true, the form field is read only in the exported PDF.

property.name: required
property.shortdesc: If true, the form field is required in the exported PDF.

property.name: printableInPdf
property.shortdesc: If true, the form field/push button is printable in the exported PDF.

property.name: hiddenUntilTriggered
property.shortdesc: If true, the form field/push button is hidden until triggered in the exported PDF.

property.name: fontSize
property.shortdesc: The font size for the form field in the exported PDF.

property.name: sortChoices
property.shortdesc: If true, the choices would be sorted in the exported PDF.

property.name: choiceList
property.shortdesc: The list of choices for combo and list boxes in the exported PDF.

property.name: rightToLeftField
property.shortdesc: If true, the form field has right to left text enabled in the exported PDF.

property.name: activeStateIndex
property.shortdesc: The index of the active state in the object's states collection.

property.name: name
property.shortdesc: The name of the ComboBox.

property.name: description
property.shortdesc: The description of the ComboBox.

property.name: allowOverrides
property.shortdesc: If true, the master page item can be overridden.

property.name: horizontalLayoutConstraints
property.shortdesc: The left margin, width, and right margin constraints this item is subject to when using the object-based layout rule.

property.name: verticalLayoutConstraints
property.shortdesc: The top margin, height, and bottom margin constraints this item is subject to when using the object-based layout rule.

property.name: geometricBounds
property.shortdesc: The bounds of the ComboBox excluding the stroke width, in the format [y1, x1, y2, x2], which give the coordinates of the top-left and bottom-right corners of the bounding box.

property.name: visibleBounds
property.shortdesc: The bounds of the ComboBox including the stroke width, in the format [y1, x1, y2, x2], which give the coordinates of the top-left and bottom-right corners of the bounding box.

property.name: fillColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the fill of the ComboBox. . Can also accept: String.

property.name: fillTint
property.shortdesc: The percent of tint to use in the ComboBox's fill color. &#40;To specify a tint percent, use a number in the range of 0 to 100; to use the inherited or overridden value, use -1.)

property.name: overprintFill
property.shortdesc: If true, the ComboBox's fill color overprints any underlying objects. If false, the fill color knocks out the underlying colors.

property.name: strokeWeight
property.shortdesc: The weight &#40;in points) to apply to the ComboBox's stroke.

property.name: miterLimit
property.shortdesc: The limit of the ratio of stroke width to miter length before a miter &#40;pointed) join becomes a bevel (squared-off) join.

property.name: endCap
property.shortdesc: The end shape of an open path.

property.name: endJoin
property.shortdesc: The corner join applied to the ComboBox.

property.name: strokeType
property.shortdesc: The name of the stroke style to apply. Can also accept: String.

property.name: strokeCornerAdjustment
property.shortdesc: The corner adjustment applied to the ComboBox.

property.name: strokeDashAndGap
property.shortdesc: The dash and gap measurements that define the pattern of a custom dashed line. Define up to six values &#40;in points) in the format [dash1, gap1, dash2, gap2, dash3, gap3].

property.name: leftLineEnd
property.shortdesc: The arrowhead applied to the start of the path.

property.name: rightLineEnd
property.shortdesc: The arrowhead applied to the end of the path.

property.name: strokeColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the stroke of the ComboBox. Can also accept: String.

property.name: strokeTint
property.shortdesc: The percent of tint to use in object's stroke color. &#40;To specify a tint percent, use a number in the range of 0 to 100; to use the inherited or overridden value, use -1.)

property.name: gradientFillStart
property.shortdesc: The starting point &#40;in page coordinates) of a gradient applied to the fill of the ComboBox, in the format [x, y].

property.name: gradientFillLength
property.shortdesc: The length &#40;for a linear gradient) or radius (for a radial gradient) applied to the fill of the ComboBox.

property.name: gradientFillAngle
property.shortdesc: The angle of a linear gradient applied to the fill of the ComboBox. &#40;Range: -180 to 180)

property.name: gradientStrokeStart
property.shortdesc: The starting point &#40;in page coordinates) of a gradient applied to the stroke of the ComboBox, in the format [x, y].

property.name: gradientStrokeLength
property.shortdesc: The length &#40;for a linear gradient) or radius (for a radial gradient) applied to the stroke of the ComboBox.

property.name: gradientStrokeAngle
property.shortdesc: The angle of a linear gradient applied to the stroke of the ComboBox. &#40;Range: -180 to 180)

property.name: overprintStroke
property.shortdesc: If true, the ComboBox's stroke color overprints any underlying objects. If false, the stroke color knocks out the  underlying colors.

property.name: gapColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the gap of a dashed, dotted, or striped stroke. For information, see stroke type.

property.name: gapTint
property.shortdesc: The tint as a percentage of the gap color. &#40;To specify a tint percent, use a number in the range of 0 to 100; to use the inherited or overridden value, use -1.)

property.name: overprintGap
property.shortdesc: If true, the gap color overprints any underlying colors. If false, the gap color knocks out the underlying colors.

property.name: strokeAlignment
property.shortdesc: The stroke alignment applied to the ComboBox.

property.name: nonprinting
property.shortdesc: If true, the ComboBox does not print.

property.name: itemLayer
property.shortdesc: The layer that the ComboBox is on.

property.name: locked
property.shortdesc: If true, the ComboBox is locked.

property.name: localDisplaySetting
property.shortdesc: Display performance options for the ComboBox.

property.name: rotationAngle
property.shortdesc: The rotatation angle of the ComboBox. &#40;Range: -360 to 360)

property.name: shearAngle
property.shortdesc: The skewing angle applied to the ComboBox. &#40;Range: -360 to 360)

property.name: horizontalScale
property.shortdesc: The horizontal scaling applied to the ComboBox.

property.name: verticalScale
property.shortdesc: The vertical scaling applied to the ComboBox.

property.name: absoluteRotationAngle
property.shortdesc: The rotation angle of the ComboBox relative to its containing object. &#40;Range: -360 to 360)

property.name: absoluteShearAngle
property.shortdesc: The skewing angle of the ComboBox relative to its containing object. &#40;Range: -360 to 360)

property.name: absoluteHorizontalScale
property.shortdesc: The horizontal scale of the ComboBox relative to its containing object.

property.name: absoluteVerticalScale
property.shortdesc: The vertical scale of the ComboBox relative to its containing object.

property.name: appliedObjectStyle
property.shortdesc: The object style applied to the ComboBox.

property.name: flip
property.shortdesc: The direction in which to flip the printed image.

property.name: absoluteFlip
property.shortdesc: Indicates whether the ComboBox has been flipped independently of its parent object and, if yes, the direction in which the ComboBox was flipped.

property.name: visible
property.shortdesc: If true, the ComboBox is visible.

property.name: topLeftCornerOption
property.shortdesc: The shape to be applied to the top left corner of rectangular shapes and all corners of non-rectangular shapes.Note: corner option differs from end join in which you can set a radius for a corner option, whereas the rounded or beveled effect of an end join depends on the stroke weight.

property.name: topRightCornerOption
property.shortdesc: The shape to apply to the top right corner of rectangular shapes

property.name: bottomLeftCornerOption
property.shortdesc: The shape to apply to the bottom left corner of rectangular shapes.

property.name: bottomRightCornerOption
property.shortdesc: The shape to apply to the bottom right corner of rectangular shapes.

property.name: topLeftCornerRadius
property.shortdesc: The radius in measurement units of the corner effect applied to the top left corner of rectangular shapes and all corners of non-rectangular shapes

property.name: topRightCornerRadius
property.shortdesc: The radius in measurement units of the corner effect applied to the top right corner of rectangular shapes

property.name: bottomLeftCornerRadius
property.shortdesc: The radius in measurement units of the corner effect applied to the bottom left corner of rectangular shapes

property.name: bottomRightCornerRadius
property.shortdesc: The radius in measurement units of the corner effect applied to the bottom right corner of rectangular shapes

property.name: label
property.shortdesc: A property that can be set to any string.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: bringToFront
method.shortdesc: Brings the ComboBox to the front of its layer or in front of a particular item.

parameter.name: reference
parameter.shortdesc: The reference object to bring the object in front of &#40;must have same parent) (Optional)

method.name: sendToBack
method.shortdesc: Sends the ComboBox to the back of its layer or behind a particular item &#40;must have same parent).

parameter.name: reference
parameter.shortdesc: The reference object to send the object behind &#40;Optional)

method.name: bringForward
method.shortdesc: Brings the ComboBox forward one level in its layer.

method.name: sendBackward
method.shortdesc: Sends the ComboBox back one level in its layer.

method.name: convertShape
method.shortdesc: Converts the ComboBox to a different shape.

parameter.name: given
parameter.shortdesc: The ComboBox's new shape.

parameter.name: numberOfSides
parameter.shortdesc: The number of sides for the resulting polygon. &#40;Range: 3 to 100) (Optional)

parameter.name: insetPercentage
parameter.shortdesc: The star inset percentage for the resulting polygon. &#40;Range: 0.0 to 100.0)  (Optional)

parameter.name: cornerRadius
parameter.shortdesc: The corner radius of the resulting rectangle. &#40;Optional)

method.name: convertToObject
method.shortdesc: Converts the button object to the page item currently in the active state. Page items from other states will be lost.

method.name: placeXML
method.shortdesc: Places XML content into the specified object. Note: Replaces any existing content.

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The XML element whose content you want to place.

method.name: autoTag
method.shortdesc: Tag the object or the parent story using default tags defined in XML preference.

method.name: markup
method.shortdesc: Associates the page item with the specified XML element while preserving existing content.

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The XML element.

method.name: findObject
method.shortdesc: Finds objects that match the find what value.

parameter.name: reverseOrder
parameter.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. &#40;Optional)

method.name: changeObject
method.shortdesc: Finds objects that match the find what value and replace the objects with the change to value.

parameter.name: reverseOrder
parameter.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. &#40;Optional)

method.name: override
method.shortdesc: Overrides a master page item and places the item on the document page as a new object.

parameter.name: destinationPage
parameter.shortdesc: The document page that contains the master page item to override.

method.name: removeOverride
method.shortdesc: Removes the override from a previously overridden master page item.

method.name: detach
method.shortdesc: Detaches an overridden master page item from the master page.

method.name: remove
method.shortdesc: Deletes the ComboBox.

method.name: fit
method.shortdesc: Applies the specified fit option to content in a frame.

parameter.name: given
parameter.shortdesc: The fit option to use.

method.name: flipItem
method.shortdesc: Flips the ComboBox.

parameter.name: given
parameter.shortdesc: The axis around which to flip the ComboBox.

parameter.name: around
parameter.shortdesc: The point around which to flip the ComboBox. Can accept: Array of 2 Units or AnchorPoint enumerator. &#40;Optional)

method.name: duplicate
method.shortdesc: Duplicates the ComboBox at the specified location or offset.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The location of the new ComboBox, specified in coordinates in the format [x, y]. Can accept: Array of 2 Units, Spread, Page or Layer. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: by
parameter.shortdesc: Amount by which to offset the new ComboBox from the original ComboBox's position. &#40;Optional)

method.name: move
method.shortdesc: Moves the ComboBox to a new location. Note: Either the 'to' or 'by' parameter is required; if both parameters are defined, only the to value is used.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The new location of the ComboBox,in the format &#40;x, y). Can accept: Array of 2 Units, Spread, Page or Layer. (Optional)

parameter.name: by
parameter.shortdesc: The amount &#40;in measurement units) to move the ComboBox relative to its current position, in the format (x, y). (Optional)

method.name: applyObjectStyle
method.shortdesc: Applies the specified object style.

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The object style to apply.

parameter.name: clearingOverrides
parameter.shortdesc: If true, clears the ComboBox's existing attributes before applying the style. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: clearingOverridesThroughRootObjectStyle
parameter.shortdesc: If true, clears attributes and formatting applied to the ComboBox that are not defined in the object style. &#40;Optional)

method.name: clearObjectStyleOverrides
method.shortdesc: Clear overrides for object style

method.name: clearTransformations
method.shortdesc: Clears transformations from the ComboBox. Transformations include rotation, scaling, flipping, fitting, and shearing.

method.name: transform
method.shortdesc: Transform the page item.

parameter.name: in
parameter.shortdesc: The coordinate space to use

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The temporary origin during the transformation. Can accept: Array of 2 Reals, AnchorPoint enumerator or Array of Arrays of 2 Reals, CoordinateSpaces enumerators, AnchorPoint enumerators, BoundingBoxLimits enumerators or Long Integers.

parameter.name: withMatrix
parameter.shortdesc: Transform matrix. Can accept: Array of 6 Reals or TransformationMatrix.

parameter.name: replacingCurrent
parameter.shortdesc: Transform components to consider; providing this optional parameter causes the target's existing transform components to be replaced with new values.  Without this parameter, the given matrix is concatenated onto the target's existing transform combining the effect of the two. Can accept: MatrixContent enumerator, Array of MatrixContent enumerators or Long Integer. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: consideringRulerUnits
parameter.shortdesc: If true then a ruler based origin is interpreted using ruler units rather than points. The default value is false. This parameter has no effect unless the reference point is specified relative to a page. &#40;Optional)

method.name: transformValuesOf
method.shortdesc: Get the transformation values of the page item.

parameter.name: in
parameter.shortdesc: The coordinate space to use

method.name: resolve
method.shortdesc: Get the coordinates of the given location in the specified coordinate system.

parameter.name: location
parameter.shortdesc: The location requested. Can accept: Array of 2 Reals, AnchorPoint enumerator or Array of Arrays of 2 Reals, CoordinateSpaces enumerators, AnchorPoint enumerators, BoundingBoxLimits enumerators or Long Integers.

parameter.name: in
parameter.shortdesc: The coordinate space to use.

parameter.name: consideringRulerUnits
parameter.shortdesc: If true then a ruler location is interpreted using ruler units rather than points. The default value is false. This parameter has no effect unless the reference point is specified relative to a page. &#40;Optional)

method.name: redefineScaling
method.shortdesc: Apply an item's scaling to its content if possible.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The scale factors to be left on the item.  The default is {1.0, 1.0}. &#40;Optional)

method.name: resize
method.shortdesc: Resize the page item.

parameter.name: in
parameter.shortdesc: The bounding box to resize. Can accept: CoordinateSpaces enumerator, BoundingBoxLimits enumerator or Ordered array containing coordinateSpace:CoordinateSpaces enumerator, boundsKind:BoundingBoxLimits enumerator.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The transform origin. Legal specifications: relative to bounding box: anchor | {anchor | {x,y}, bounds kind [, coordinate space]}; relative to coordinate space: {x,y} | {{x,y}[, coordinate space]}; relative to layout window ruler: {{x,y}, page index | bounds kind}. Can accept: Array of 2 Reals, AnchorPoint enumerator or Array of Arrays of 2 Reals, CoordinateSpaces enumerators, AnchorPoint enumerators, BoundingBoxLimits enumerators or Long Integers.

parameter.name: by
parameter.shortdesc: How the current dimensions are affected by the given values

parameter.name: values
parameter.shortdesc: The width and height values. Legal dimensions specifications: {x, y [, coordinate space]}, {x, resize constraint [, coordinate space]}, or {resize constraint, y [, coordinate space]}; where x and y are real numbers and coordinate space is used to determine _only_ the unit of length for x and y; coordinate space is ignored for the 'current dimensions times' resize method&#41;. Can accept: Array of Reals, ResizeConstraints enumerators or CoordinateSpaces enumerators.

parameter.name: resizeIndividually
parameter.shortdesc: If false and multiple page items are targeted, the new dimensions are attained only by moving the individual items rather than resizing them. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: consideringRulerUnits
parameter.shortdesc: If true then a ruler location is interpreted using ruler units rather than points. The default value is false. This parameter has no effect unless the reference point is specified relative to a page. &#40;Optional)

method.name: reframe
method.shortdesc: Move the bounding box of the page item

parameter.name: in
parameter.shortdesc: The bounding box to resize. Can accept: CoordinateSpaces enumerator or Ordered array containing coordinateSpace:CoordinateSpaces enumerator, boundsKind:BoundingBoxLimits enumerator.

parameter.name: opposingCorners
parameter.shortdesc: Opposing corners of new bounding box in the given coordinate space

method.name: transformAgain
method.shortdesc: Transforms the ComboBox using the last transformation performed on any object. Transformations include moving, rotating, shearing, scaling, and flipping.

method.name: transformSequenceAgain
method.shortdesc: Transforms the ComboBox using the last sequence of transform operations performed on any single object or performed at the same time on any group of objects. Transformations include moving, rotating, shearing, scaling, and flipping.

method.name: transformAgainIndividually
method.shortdesc: Transforms the ComboBox using the last transformation performed on any ComboBox. Transformations include moving, rotating, shearing, scaling, and flipping.

method.name: transformSequenceAgainIndividually
method.shortdesc: Transforms the ComboBox using the last sequence of transformations performed on any single object or performed at the same time on any group of objects. Transformations include moving, rotating, shearing, scaling, and flipping.

method.name: createPlainTextQRCode
method.shortdesc: Create Plain Text QR Code on the page item

parameter.name: plainText
parameter.shortdesc: QR code Plain Text  &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: qrCodeSwatch
parameter.shortdesc: Swatch to be applied on generated QR Code Graphic . Can accept: Swatch or String. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new ComboBox. Above parameters can also be passed as properties &#40;Optional)

method.name: createHyperlinkQRCode
method.shortdesc: Create Hyperlink QR Code on the page item or document

parameter.name: urlLink
parameter.shortdesc: QR code Hyperlink URL  &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: qrCodeSwatch
parameter.shortdesc: Swatch to be applied on generated QR Code Graphic . Can accept: Swatch or String. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new ComboBox. Above parameters can also be passed as properties &#40;Optional)

method.name: createTextMsgQRCode
method.shortdesc: Create Text Msg QR Code on the page item or document

parameter.name: cellNumber
parameter.shortdesc: QR code Text Phone Number &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: textMessage
parameter.shortdesc: QR code Text Message &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: qrCodeSwatch
parameter.shortdesc: Swatch to be applied on generated QR Code Graphic . Can accept: Swatch or String. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new ComboBox. Above parameters can also be passed as properties &#40;Optional)

method.name: createEmailQRCode
method.shortdesc: Create Email QR Code on the page item or document

parameter.name: emailAddress
parameter.shortdesc: QR code Email Address &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: subject
parameter.shortdesc: QR code Email Subject &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: body
parameter.shortdesc: QR code Email Body Message &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: qrCodeSwatch
parameter.shortdesc: Swatch to be applied on generated QR Code Graphic . Can accept: Swatch or String. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new ComboBox. Above parameters can also be passed as properties &#40;Optional)

method.name: createVCardQRCode
method.shortdesc: Create Business Card QR Code on the page item or load on document's placegun

parameter.name: firstName
parameter.shortdesc: QR code Business Card First Name &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: lastName
parameter.shortdesc: QR code Business Card Last Name &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: jobTitle
parameter.shortdesc: QR code Business Card Title &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: cellPhone
parameter.shortdesc: QR code Business Card Cell Phone Number &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: phone
parameter.shortdesc: QR code Business Card Phone Number &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: email
parameter.shortdesc: QR code Business Card Email Address &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: organisation
parameter.shortdesc: QR code Business Card Organisation &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: streetAddress
parameter.shortdesc: QR code Business Card Street Address &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: city
parameter.shortdesc: QR code Business Card City &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: country
parameter.shortdesc: QR code Business Card Country &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: postalCode
parameter.shortdesc: QR code Business Card Postal Code &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: website
parameter.shortdesc: QR code Business Card URL &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: qrCodeSwatch
parameter.shortdesc: Swatch to be applied on generated QR Code Graphic . Can accept: Swatch or String. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new ComboBox. Above parameters can also be passed as properties &#40;Optional)

method.name: exportFile
method.shortdesc: Exports the object&#40;s) to a file.

parameter.name: format
parameter.shortdesc: The export format, specified as an enumeration value or as an extension that appears in the Save as type or Format menu in the Export dialog. Can accept: ExportFormat enumerator or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The path to the export file.

parameter.name: showingOptions
parameter.shortdesc: If true, displays the export options dialog. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The export style. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: versionComments
parameter.shortdesc: The comment for this version. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: forceSave
parameter.shortdesc: If true, forcibly saves a version. &#40;Optional)

method.name: asynchronousExportFile
method.shortdesc: asynchronously exports the object&#40;s) to a file.

parameter.name: format
parameter.shortdesc: The export format, specified as an enumeration value or as an extension that appears in the Save as type or Format menu in the Export dialog. Can accept: ExportFormat enumerator or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The path to the export file.

parameter.name: showingOptions
parameter.shortdesc: If true, displays the export options dialog. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The export style. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: versionComments
parameter.shortdesc: The comment for this version. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: forceSave
parameter.shortdesc: If true, forcibly saves a version. &#40;Optional)

method.name: contentPlace
method.shortdesc: Duplicate an object and place it into the target page item.

parameter.name: pageItems
parameter.shortdesc: One or more page items to place or load

parameter.name: linkPageItems
parameter.shortdesc: Whether to link pageItems in content placer &#40;if true it will override link stories value) (Optional)

parameter.name: linkStories
parameter.shortdesc: Whether to link stories in content placer &#40;only applicable for single story, pageItem links will also be created in case of more than one item) (Optional)

parameter.name: mapStyles
parameter.shortdesc: Whether to map styles in content placer &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: showingOptions
parameter.shortdesc: Whether to display the link options dialog &#40;Optional)

method.name: select
method.shortdesc: Selects the object.

parameter.name: existingSelection
parameter.shortdesc: The selection status of the ComboBox in relation to previously selected objects. &#40;Optional)

method.name: store
method.shortdesc: Stores the object in the specified library.

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The library in which to store the object.

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new ComboBox &#40;Optional)

method.name: insertLabel
method.shortdesc: Sets the label to the value associated with the specified key.

parameter.name: key
parameter.shortdesc: The key.

parameter.name: value
parameter.shortdesc: The value.

method.name: extractLabel
method.shortdesc: Gets the label value associated with the specified key.

parameter.name: key
parameter.shortdesc: The key.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the ComboBox.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

method.name: toSpecifier
method.shortdesc: Retrieves the object specifier.

method.name: addEventListener
method.shortdesc: Adds an event listener.

parameter.name: eventType
parameter.shortdesc: The event type.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: captures
parameter.shortdesc: This parameter is obsolete. &#40;Optional)

method.name: removeEventListener
method.shortdesc: Removes the event listener.

parameter.name: eventType
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event type.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: captures
parameter.shortdesc: This parameter is obsolete. &#40;Optional)
